   1  <?php
   2  /**
   3   * Engine.php
   4   *
   5   * Copyright, Moxiecode Systems AB
   6   * Released under LGPL License.
   7   *
   8   * License: http://www.tinymce.com/license
   9   * Contributing: http://www.tinymce.com/contributing
  10   *
  11   * Base class for all spellcheckers this takes in the words to check
  12   * spelling on and returns the suggestions.
  13   */
  14  
  15  class TinyMCE_SpellChecker_Engine {
  16      private static $engines = array();
  17      private $config;
  18  
  19  	public function __constructor($config) {
  20          $this->config = $config;
  21      }
  22  
  23      /**
  24       * Spellchecks an array of words.
  25       *
  26       * @param String $lang Selected language code (like en_US or de_DE). Shortcodes like "en" and "de" work with enchant >= 1.4.1
  27       * @param Array $words Array of words to check.
  28       * @return Name/value object with arrays of suggestions.
  29       */
  30  	public function getSuggestions($lang, $words) {
  31          return array();
  32      }
  33  
  34      /**
  35       * Return true/false if the engine is supported by the server.
  36       *
  37       * @return boolean True/false if the engine is supported.
  38       */
  39  	public function isSupported() {
  40          return true;
  41      }
  42  
  43      /**
  44       * Sets the config array used to create the instance.
  45       *
  46       * @param Array $config Name/value array with config options.
  47       */
  48  	public function setConfig($config) {
  49          $this->config = $config;
  50      }
  51  
  52      /**
  53       * Returns the config array used to create the instance.
  54       *
  55       * @return Array Name/value array with config options.
  56       */
  57  	public function getConfig() {
  58          return $this->config;
  59      }
  60  
  61      // Static methods
  62  
  63  	public static function processRequest($tinymceSpellcheckerConfig) {
  64          $engine = self::get($tinymceSpellcheckerConfig["engine"]);
  65          $engine = new $engine();
  66          $engine->setConfig($tinymceSpellcheckerConfig);
  67  
  68          header('Content-Type: application/json');
  69          header('Content-Encoding: UTF-8');
  70          header("Expires: Mon, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT");
  71          header("Last-Modified: " . gmdate("D, d M Y H:i:s") . " GMT");
  72          header("Cache-Control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate");
  73          header("Cache-Control: post-check=0, pre-check=0", false);
  74          header("Pragma: no-cache");
  75  
  76          $method = self::getParam("method", "spellcheck");
  77          $lang = self::getParam("lang", "en_US");
  78          $text = self::getParam("text");
  79  
  80          if ($method == "spellcheck") {
  81              try {
  82                  if (!$text) {
  83                      throw new Exception("Missing input parameter 'text'.");
  84                  }
  85  
  86                  if (!$engine->isSupported()) {
  87                      throw new Exception("Current spellchecker isn't supported.");
  88                  }
  89  
  90                  $words = self::getWords($text);
  91  
  92                  echo json_encode((object) array(
  93                      "words" => (object) $engine->getSuggestions($lang, $words)
  94                  ));
  95              } catch (Exception $e) {
  96                  echo json_encode((object) array(
  97                      "error" => $e->getMessage()
  98                  ));
  99              }
 100          } else {
 101              echo json_encode((object) array(
 102                  "error" => "Invalid JSON input"
 103              ));
 104          }
 105      }
 106  
 107      /**
 108       * Returns an request value by name without magic quoting.
 109       *
 110       * @param String $name Name of parameter to get.
 111       * @param String $default_value Default value to return if value not found.
 112       * @return String request value by name without magic quoting or default value.
 113       */
 114  	public static function getParam($name, $default_value = false) {
 115          if (isset($_POST[$name])) {
 116              $req = $_POST;
 117          } else if (isset($_GET[$name])) {
 118              $req = $_GET;
 119          } else {
 120              return $default_value;
 121          }
 122  
 123          // Handle magic quotes
 124          if (ini_get("magic_quotes_gpc")) {
 125              if (is_array($req[$name])) {
 126                  $out = array();
 127  
 128                  foreach ($req[$name] as $name => $value) {
 129                      $out[stripslashes($name)] = stripslashes($value);
 130                  }
 131  
 132                  return $out;
 133              }
 134  
 135              return stripslashes($req[$name]);
 136          }
 137  
 138          return $req[$name];
 139      }
 140  
 141  	public static function add($name, $className) {
 142          self::$engines[$name] = $className;
 143      }
 144  
 145  	public static function get($name) {
 146          if (!isset(self::$engines[$name])) {
 147              return null;
 148          }
 149  
 150          return self::$engines[$name];
 151      }
 152  
 153  	public static function getWords($text) {
 154          preg_match_all('(\w{3,})u', $text, $matches);
 155          $words = $matches[0];
 156  
 157          for ($i = count($words) - 1;  $i >= 0; $i--) {
 158              // Exclude words with numbers in them
 159              if (preg_match('/[0-9]+/', $words[$i])) {
 160                  array_splice($words, $i, 1);
 161              }
 162          }
 163  
 164          return $words;
 165      }
 166  }
 167
